sentences.sContent: Years passed, happy years when the roses bloomed and the copper coffer grew.
sentences.sContent_eng: Years passed, happy years when the roses bloomed and the copper coffer grew.
sentences.sCn: 几年过去了，幸福的几年过去了，这几年玫瑰开放，铜保险箱在变大。

remMethod.val: 保险柜(coffer)里珍藏了一种颇有价值的咖啡(coffee)

trans.tranOther: a large strong box used to hold valuable or religious objects
